Pre-Game Insights: Bebe is the squad's figurehead and a key player for Cape Verde, who take on Ghana in their opening match in Ivory Coast.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bebe has a successful eighth season at Rayo Vallecano of Spain's top division.
Cape Verde's squad are in economy class en route to Ivory Coast.
Bebe was born outside the islands to parents with Cape Verdean heritage.
Others: Bebe's nickname 'Baby' has outlasted its logical lifespan, and he is now a 33-year-old man with a top-flight club career and a first major international tournament.
